text: Kathleen Marie Marshall (n√©e Soltero; born July 22, 1959) is an American lawyer and politician. She was the 35th Lieutenant Governor of Nevada from 2019 until 2021. She is a member of the Democratic Party and was the Nevada State Treasurer. In 2021, she became the White House Senior Advisor to Governors during the Joe Biden administration. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:Lieutenant Governors of Nevada Category:Living people Category:Politicians from San Francisco Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Lawyers from San Francisco Category:Lawyers from Nevada
title: Kate Marshall
